title: Solar Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Camera Outdoor Wireless for Home Surveillance with Fixed Solar Panel, 2K Color Night Vision, Two-Way Audio with Spotlight Siren PIR Motion Detection. (Wi-Fi)
description: Elevate your home security with our Solar Powered Wireless Security Camera. Designed for easy installation, this camera eliminates the need for cables, harnessing energy from a built-in 3W solar panel and a robust 9000mAh lithium battery for uninterrupted monitoring. With advanced PIR motion detection, receive real-time alerts and communicate through two-way audio, ensuring you stay connected. Enjoy crystal-clear 3MP video quality, even at night, thanks to its automatic night vision mode. Plus, flexible storage options, including support for Micro SD cards and free 15-day cloud storage, make managing your recordings effortless. Protect your home with cutting-edge technology that works off-grid and offers peace of mind around the clock.
